TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: Aftermath - The Return of Macey Dean!

Articles.Content: After more than a year of absence Macey Dean returns to the realm of YouTube, and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re already looking forward to his next video. Welcome back, Macey!

That's awesome ! 

What's also awesome is that the daily kerbal is coming back from the dead ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
So, both Macey Dean and The Daily Kerbal are alive!
Frankly, I'm more excited that the Daily Kerbal is back than that Macey Dean is back.

DAILY KERBAL YEEESSSSSSSS

so much yes.

I didn't own the game when Macey Dean was making videos, so the return of the Daily Kerbal is more important to me. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Daily Kerbal is back!!! (But no devnote tuesdays? Augh!)

> 
> Daily Kerbal is back!!! (But no devnote tuesdays? Augh!)

I really love Devnote Tuesdays. Even when I'm not playing, I follow them religiously.

Thank you for continuing the Daily Kerbal! There's also a modding boom now in the community, so many amazing new people have stepped in to bring new ideas to life in this game! Waiting for the modding days of Daily Kerbal as well ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Since Squad was on R&R last week i think they didn't have much to add in the devnotes for 1 days work. I think/hope there will be some fresh devnotes next week.

> 
> Since Squad was on R&R last week i think they didn't have much to add in the devnotes for 1 days work. I think/hope there will be some fresh devnotes next week.

Fair point.

It's amazing how people are happier at The Daily Kerbal coming back than Macey coming back, lol.

Definetively not SQUAD thought it would be like.
Macey makes excellent KSP videos. I've really missed him

Now that Macey is back, we need some more capital ships to go into his new series (im assuming Macey's gonna make a new (err continued) series like the carrier Spiritwolf thing. Hopefully AKS can get in on some of the action with their new fleet of warships around Dres. Hanland will feel the wrath of the newly built AKS battlegroup consisting of some very powerful armor for the mass and part count!

My newest ship is the SK-CRV-III 3rd generation corvette class.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/sH2dq)

Also, made a cinematic warship a few days ago, not sure if Macey is quite looking for any cinematic vessels (with fully modeled interactive IVAs), but if so feel free to use my BC-304 "Korolev" for either side since its not exactly a pure AKS vessel, just some Stargate crap i rebuilt after 1.0 hit, my old one was also way more parts and didnt have internals anywhere as detailed as this does.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/b8E1V)

if you (or anyone else for that matter) is interested in using these for a video, just check my craft repository on my company page, click the picture in signature and then go to craft repository link (mediafire folder).

> 
> Frankly, I'm more excited that the Daily Kerbal is back than that Macey Dean is back.

Same here. I watched a few of his videos, and I liked them. They were a nice balance between the EE's commentated, relatively unedited videos, and HatBat's cinematic. The Daily Kerbal, though, is literally the first thing I check when I get home, especially if it's a Tuesday.
